author: Dr15Jones
body: The code which was used to dereference an edm::Ref had a race condition where one thread could have updated the cache right after another thread checked to see if the cache had been updated. This would lead to productGetter() returning a null value which was then used to attempt a function call. The code now only calls productGetter() once and handles the case where it was changed since the last check.
title: Fix a race condition in edm::Ref
